Title: Relates to the processing of evidence related to sexual offenses and the inclusion of such results in the state DNA identification index
Summary: Relates to the processing of evidence related to sexual offenses and the inclusion of such results in the state DNA identification index; requires evidence of sexual offenses to be collected and forwarded to any forensic DNA laboratory for testing within the established time frame.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the processing of evidence related to sexual offenses and the inclusion of such results in the state DNA identification index
